Package com.g1.mychess.match.service.impl

Class MatchServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.match.service.impl.MatchServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchService
@Service public class MatchServiceImpl extends Object implements MatchService
Service implementation for match-related operations in the chess application. Provides methods to retrieve matches by tournament, round, and match results.

  • Method Details

    • findAllMatchByTournament

      public List<MatchDTO> findAllMatchByTournament(Long tournamentId)
      Retrieves all matches associated with a given tournament.
      Specified by:
      findAllMatchByTournament in interface MatchService
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament.
      Returns:
      A list of MatchDTO objects representing the matches in the tournament.
      Throws:
      TournamentNotFoundException - if the tournament with the given ID does not exist.

    • findAllMatchByTournamentRound

      public List<MatchDTO> findAllMatchByTournamentRound(Long tournamentId, Integer roundNumber)
      Retrieves all matches associated with a specific round of a given tournament. It first checks whether the tournament exists and then fetches matches for the specified round.
      Specified by:
      findAllMatchByTournamentRound in interface MatchService
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament.
      roundNumber - The round number of the tournament.
      Returns:
      A list of MatchDTO objects representing the matches in the specified round.
      Throws:
      TournamentNotFoundException - if the tournament with the given ID does not exist.
      TournamentRoundNotFoundException - if the round number does not exist for the tournament.

    • findAllMatchResultsByTournament

      public List<MatchResultDTO> findAllMatchResultsByTournament(Long tournamentId)
      Retrieves all match results associated with a given tournament. Builds a MatchResultDTO for each match containing information about the winner, loser, or draw.
      Specified by:
      findAllMatchResultsByTournament in interface MatchService
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament.
      Returns:
      A list of MatchResultDTO objects representing the results of matches in the tournament.
      Throws:
      TournamentNotFoundException - if the tournament with the given ID does not exist.

    • getTournamentResults

      public TournamentResultsDTO getTournamentResults(Long tournamentId)
      Retrieves the results of a specific tournament based on the provided tournament ID. This method queries the match players in the tournament, orders them by points in descending order, and then maps the results to a TournamentResultsDTO.
      Specified by:
      getTournamentResults in interface MatchService
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament for which the results are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A TournamentResultsDTO containing the ordered results of the specified tournament.

    • sendMatchReminders

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=3600000L) public void sendMatchReminders()
      Sends reminders for upcoming matches scheduled within the next hour. This method runs every hour (configured with @Scheduled annotation), and retrieves matches that are scheduled to start in the next hour, then sends reminder emails to the participants.
      Specified by:
      sendMatchReminders in interface MatchService
